SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppDirectoryManager
Represents the manager of the application's directory, where necessary files are stored.
CleanerService
Service for the CleanerView.
CleanerView
Represents the UI component responsible for displaying a dialog that allows the user to select the days of the week for performing a cleaning operation.
DialogUtils
Represents class that provides utility methods for all classes.
InfoView
Represents UI of the information panel which shows to the user details about database or planner using.
LocalTimeAdapter
Adapter for serializing and deserializing LocalTime objects into and from JSON file.
Main
Main class which serves as the entry point of the application.
MainFrame
Represents the main window of the application.
MainPanelController
Represents the controller for the MainPanelView class.
MainPanelView
Represents the UI of the main panel displayed to the user after launching the application.
PanelNames
Represents the names of the panels used in the application.
PlannerController
Represents the controller for the PlannerView.
PlannerRepository
Represents the repository of the planner.
PlannerService
Service for the PlannerView.
PlannerView
Represents a UI of the planner which is used to display a weekly planner to the user based on their tasks.
RepositoryConfigurator
Represents a configurator for the repositories.
SingleTask
Represents the SingleTask object in the application.
TaskAddingDialog
UI of the task adding dialog that allows the user to add a task to the planner.
TaskAddingDialogController
Controller of the TaskAddingDialog class.
TaskDialogView
Builder for the UI dialogs related to task management.
TaskDialogView.TaskDialogBuilder
Inner static class for building task dialog views with various components.
TaskEditingDialog
UI of the task editing dialog that allows the user to edit a task in the planner.
TaskEditingDialogController
Controller of the TaskEditingDialog class.
TaskNamesController
Controller for the TaskNamesDialog class.
TaskNamesDialog
Represents the UI of the task names database allowing users to add and remove task names in a database.
TaskNamesRepository
Represents the repository of the task names.
TaskNamesService
Singleton service for the TaskNamesDialog.
TasksService
Represents a service for handling tasks.
WeekdayPlannerService
Singleton service for the WeekdayPlannerViewes.
WeekdayPlannerView
Represents UI of the schedule for a given weekday, displaying the name of the weekday, its schedule and a return button to the user.
WeekDays
Represents the days of the week, along with utility methods for day name retrieval.
